text: Somatidia fauveli is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1961. It is known from New Caledonia.BioLib.cz - Somatidia fauveli. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1961
title: Somatidia fauveli
